content: I'm really excited to try out the mop brush, especially after seeing that amazing installation of recycled fabric scraps at the local art museum with Emma on February 25th. The way the artist used texture and color was incredibly thought-provoking, and I think the mop brush could help me achieve similar effects in my own work. Can you recommend any online tutorials or resources that could help me learn more about watercolor techniques and how to get the most out of my new brushes?
